data.name: Is Fred a good golfer or not?
data.description:
Fred has been playing golf for a year now so he is far from professional. He is a little concerned about his current scores. He wants to figure out whether he should get some practice or whether he is considered a good golfer, can you help him?

The par for an 18 hole golf course can vary between 69-72. The input (par) will be within this range.

The second input (strokes) is the number of strokes it took Fred to get around the golf course.

Rules:

- If Fred shoots 18 or 18+ strokes above par, you should return: "Fred, you need some practice buddy".

- If Fred shoots lower than 18 above par, you should return: "Fred, you are considered a good golfer, good work!".

Given the two numbers, can you work out whether Fred needs to practice or not?
